long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download videos from Gong.io with just a click!

"Gong Video Downloader" is a simple and efficient tool designed for Gong.io users who need quick access to their videos offline. Whether for training, reviews, or archiving, this extension helps you save Gong.io videos directly to your device in a hassle-free manner.

Key Features:

One-Click Downloads: Save Gong.io videos directly from the site.
Seamless Integration: Works on all Gong.io pages, automatically detecting videos.
Secure and Private: Operates entirely within your browser; no data is collected.
Lightweight and Fast: Minimal resource usage for optimal performance.
How to Use:

Install the extension.
Visit Gong.io and navigate to a video.
Click the extension icon or the download button to save the video.
Permissions:
This extension requires access to Gong.io to detect and download videos effectively.

Stay organized and keep your important Gong.io videos accessible, even offline!
